subject: how best to use evpmaker?
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-146311886-1200503651=:60282
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I am getting nowhere with my RS hack here in Mexico. I still need to send a recorded session to Bruce to double check because I may not be hearing certain things and I would like a verification of the signal quality I am receiving.  HST I do have EVP maker and I am now encouraged by what Frank S is saying.  Any tips on how to do a session with this program?  Ron L
